#include <iostream>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	ll int t;
	string s;
	double a,f;
	cin>>t>>s>>a>>f;
	ll int i=0;int c=0;double sum=0.0;
	while(i<t)
	{	
		if(s[i]=='R')
		sum+=a;
		else if(s[i]=='L')
		sum-=a;
		if(sum>f || sum<-f)
		{c=1;break;}i++;
	}
	if(c==0)
	cout<<"YES"<<"\n";
	else
	cout<<"NO"<<"\n";
	return 0;
}
